response.original_title: Roger Waters: Dark Side Of The Moon
response.overview: The material on was recorded live during the Roger Waters "Dark Side Of The Moon" tour in 2006-2008. This is not the recording of a specific show, but a production containing material of several shows. The intention is, to give you a better feeling about the experience of the original Live Shows.  This production contains material from the following sources:  Setlist: In The Flesh  - Mother - Set The Controls For The Heart Of The Sun - Shine On You Crazy Diamond - Have A Cigar - Wish You Were Here - Southampton Dock - The Fletcher Memorial Home - Perfect Sense (parts 1 and 2) - Leaving Beirut - Sheep - Speak To Me - Breathe - On The Run - Time - The Great Gig In The Sky - Money - Us And Them - Any Colour You Like - Brain Damage - Eclipse - The Happiest Days Of Our Lives - Another Brick In The Wall (part 2)  - Vera - Bring The Boys Back Home - Comfortably Numb
response.title: Roger Waters: Dark Side Of The Moon
